input.sentences: [male] had no idea what was in store .
his mother made him a special monkey cake for his birthday .
he showed his mom the best present he received .
he even pretended to read the book !
output.sentences: Mom went to the party store to get some ideas for a male child's Birthday celebration.
This was going to be special, as Mother found little Nathan a monkey cake!
At the party he received many fun gifts.
Even Mom received an unexpected gift for herself.
As Nathan read his new book he pretended he was the hero in the story.
